adviseScripts.text: *Yawn*
adviseScripts.speaker: Neve

adviseScripts.text: Is there any way I can keep myself from sleeping so much?
adviseScripts.speaker: Neve

adviseScripts.text: You should sleep if you're tired.
Try drinking coffee.
Haha, that's great.
adviseScripts.speaker: Neve

adviseScripts.text: I knew you'd feel the same way.
adviseScripts.speaker: Neve

adviseScripts.text: Well, I'm off to bed then!
adviseScripts.speaker: Neve

adviseScripts.text: I've already tried that, remember?
adviseScripts.speaker: Neve

adviseScripts.text: It didn't do a thing.
adviseScripts.speaker: Neve

adviseScripts.text: I talk about sleep with Neve.
What's your favorite kind of bear?
adviseScripts.speaker: Neve

adviseScripts.text: Polar bears, grizzly bears, or brown bears?
adviseScripts.speaker: Neve

adviseScripts.text: Polar bears.
Grizzly bears.
Same here.
adviseScripts.speaker: Neve

adviseScripts.text: Isn't their fur just so cute and cuddly?
adviseScripts.speaker: Neve

adviseScripts.text: Polar bears are the best.
adviseScripts.speaker: Neve

adviseScripts.text: Grizzly bears?
adviseScripts.speaker: Neve

adviseScripts.text: I thought you'd say polar bears...
adviseScripts.speaker: Neve

adviseScripts.text: I talk about bears with Neve.
Burly Bear,
adviseScripts.speaker: Neve

adviseScripts.text: what do you think is the softest thing in the world?
adviseScripts.speaker: Neve

adviseScripts.text: A cloud?
The space in between my arms.
Hmm, I didn't think of that.
adviseScripts.speaker: Neve

adviseScripts.text: But now that you mention it, I suppose they would be pretty soft.
adviseScripts.speaker: Neve

adviseScripts.text: Hehe...
adviseScripts.speaker: Neve

adviseScripts.text: Then can you hold me for a moment?
adviseScripts.speaker: Neve

adviseScripts.text: I was feeling sleepy anyway.
adviseScripts.speaker: Neve

adviseScripts.text: I have a meaningful conversation with Neve.
Zzzzzz...
adviseScripts.speaker: Neve

adviseScripts.text: Don't do anything.
Wake Neve up.
Zzzz...
adviseScripts.speaker: Neve

adviseScripts.text: ZZZZZZzzzzz...
adviseScripts.speaker: Neve

adviseScripts.text: Hey!
adviseScripts.speaker: Neve

adviseScripts.text: What'd you wake me up for?
adviseScripts.speaker: Neve

adviseScripts.text: I was having a great dream.
adviseScripts.speaker: Neve

adviseScripts.text: I watch Neve go back to sleep.
Winter is my favorite season.
adviseScripts.speaker: Neve

adviseScripts.text: I get to wear heavy layers and get some great sleep.
adviseScripts.speaker: Neve

adviseScripts.text: Do you like winter too?
adviseScripts.speaker: Neve

adviseScripts.text: I do, but I like you even more.
Winter is too cold for me.
A little off-topic,
adviseScripts.speaker: Neve

adviseScripts.text: but a lovely answer nonetheless, hehe! You get a pass.
adviseScripts.speaker: Neve

adviseScripts.text: You get cold easily, huh?
adviseScripts.speaker: Neve

adviseScripts.text: I don't really like summer.
adviseScripts.speaker: Neve

adviseScripts.text: Neve and I talk about our favorite seasons.
I know there are a few other Nikkes who sleep,
adviseScripts.speaker: Neve

adviseScripts.text: but I must be the only one that sleeps this much.
adviseScripts.speaker: Neve

adviseScripts.text: There's a possible contender called Frima.
Most likely.
She sleeps as much as me?
adviseScripts.speaker: Neve

adviseScripts.text: I can't let anyone dethrone me!
adviseScripts.speaker: Neve

adviseScripts.text: I've gotta work hard and sleep more than ever.
adviseScripts.speaker: Neve

adviseScripts.text: I don't know why,
adviseScripts.speaker: Neve

adviseScripts.text: but I feel a strange sense of pride about that.
adviseScripts.speaker: Neve

adviseScripts.text: I talk about sleep with Neve.
Alice is so adorable.
adviseScripts.speaker: Neve

adviseScripts.text: Doesn't she remind you of a baby bunny?
adviseScripts.speaker: Neve

adviseScripts.text: She's not as cute as you are.
I'm cuter.
Oh my, well... thank you.
adviseScripts.speaker: Neve

adviseScripts.text: You just made my day. I'm not even tired anymore!
adviseScripts.speaker: Neve

adviseScripts.text: I mean, you're not wrong!
adviseScripts.speaker: Neve

adviseScripts.text: You're super cute, Burly Bear.
adviseScripts.speaker: Neve

adviseScripts.text: I talk about cute things with Neve.
Every time I drink tea with Ludmilla,
adviseScripts.speaker: Neve

adviseScripts.text: I get so sleepy.
adviseScripts.speaker: Neve

adviseScripts.text: Ask her for some cold tea.
Try to sleep with your eyes open.
Smart! I'll try it next time.
adviseScripts.speaker: Neve

adviseScripts.text: I shouldn't be as sleepy if I drink something cold.
adviseScripts.speaker: Neve

adviseScripts.text: Hmm... I'm not entirely sure if that's even possible,
adviseScripts.speaker: Neve

adviseScripts.text: but I'll keep it in mind.
adviseScripts.speaker: Neve

adviseScripts.text: I have a meaningful conversation with Neve.
*Yawn*
adviseScripts.speaker: Neve

adviseScripts.text: *Yaaaawwwn*
adviseScripts.speaker: Neve

adviseScripts.text: *Ya*
adviseScripts.speaker: Neve

adviseScripts.text: Boo!
*Yaaaawwwn*
Wow, you finished my yawn for me!
adviseScripts.speaker: Neve

adviseScripts.text: *Yaaaawwwn*
adviseScripts.speaker: Neve

adviseScripts.text: Gah!
adviseScripts.speaker: Neve

adviseScripts.text: You scared me.
adviseScripts.speaker: Neve

adviseScripts.text: I have a yawning competition with Neve.
Alice and I were talking about which animal is the cutest.
adviseScripts.speaker: Neve

adviseScripts.text: I say polar bears are the cutest, but Alice feels rabbits are cuter.
adviseScripts.speaker: Neve

adviseScripts.text: What do you think, Burly Bear?
adviseScripts.speaker: Neve

adviseScripts.text: Polar bears are cuter.
Rabbits are cuter.
I knew it. Nothing tops polar bears.
adviseScripts.speaker: Neve

adviseScripts.text: Who can resist all that cuddly cuteness?
adviseScripts.speaker: Neve

adviseScripts.text: I suppose rabbits are pretty cute too.
adviseScripts.speaker: Neve

adviseScripts.text: Alice will be happy to hear you say that.
adviseScripts.speaker: Neve

adviseScripts.text: Neve and I talk about our favorite animals.
Do you ever feel lonely?
adviseScripts.speaker: Neve

adviseScripts.text: Sometimes when I'm out searching for polar bears,
adviseScripts.speaker: Neve

adviseScripts.text: I get a little lonesome.
adviseScripts.speaker: Neve

adviseScripts.text: Why don't you have Alice and Ludmilla join you?
I can always join you.
They're both busy with their own jobs.
adviseScripts.speaker: Neve

adviseScripts.text: Although it would be fun if we searched together.
adviseScripts.speaker: Neve

adviseScripts.text: You will?
adviseScripts.speaker: Neve

adviseScripts.text: That's great! When can you come up?
adviseScripts.speaker: Neve

adviseScripts.text: I'll come and pick you up.
adviseScripts.speaker: Neve

adviseScripts.text: I have a meaningful conversation with Neve.
If you could give me a nickname,
adviseScripts.speaker: Neve

adviseScripts.text: what would it be?
adviseScripts.speaker: Neve

adviseScripts.text: The Sleep Queen.
Sleepyhead.
Oooh, that has a nice ring to it
adviseScripts.speaker: Neve

adviseScripts.text: Ludmilla is the Snow Queen,
adviseScripts.speaker: Neve

adviseScripts.text: so it's only fitting that I'm the Sleep Queen.
adviseScripts.speaker: Neve

adviseScripts.text: Sleepyhead?
adviseScripts.speaker: Neve

adviseScripts.text: I thought you'd come up with something a bit more... elegant?
adviseScripts.speaker: Neve

adviseScripts.text: I have a conversation about nicknames with Neve.
If you had to name one positive quality about me,
adviseScripts.speaker: Neve

adviseScripts.text: what would it be?
adviseScripts.speaker: Neve

adviseScripts.text: Umm... well... let me think...
There are so many. I can't possibly choose just one.
If it's taking you that long to come up with something,
adviseScripts.speaker: Neve

adviseScripts.text: I'll take it that means I don't have any positive qualities at all.
adviseScripts.speaker: Neve

adviseScripts.text: You're too kind.
adviseScripts.speaker: Neve

adviseScripts.text: I was going to say the same thing about you.
adviseScripts.speaker: Neve

adviseScripts.text: I have a meaningful conversation with Neve.
I've always wondered,
adviseScripts.speaker: Neve

adviseScripts.text: why do people get so scared when they see a polar bear up close?
adviseScripts.speaker: Neve

adviseScripts.text: Because they're known for eating people.
Beats me. I think they're cute.
Hmm... I suppose if you thought about them that way,
adviseScripts.speaker: Neve

adviseScripts.text: then they would seem pretty scary.
adviseScripts.speaker: Neve

adviseScripts.text: I feel the same way.
adviseScripts.speaker: Neve

adviseScripts.text: Great minds think alike.
adviseScripts.speaker: Neve

adviseScripts.text: They're just so round and fluffy!
adviseScripts.speaker: Neve

adviseScripts.text: I have a conversation about polar bears with Neve.
What is it about sleep that makes it so great?
adviseScripts.speaker: Neve

adviseScripts.text: Is there anything in the world sweeter than sleep?
adviseScripts.speaker: Neve

adviseScripts.text: A kiss from me.
Chocolate.
Oooh, it is?
adviseScripts.speaker: Neve

adviseScripts.text: Any chance I can see for myself?
adviseScripts.speaker: Neve

adviseScripts.text: It was only a figure of speech.
adviseScripts.speaker: Neve

adviseScripts.text: You don't have to take everything so literally.
adviseScripts.speaker: Neve

adviseScripts.text: I have a conversation about sweet things with Neve.
Burly Bear,
adviseScripts.speaker: Neve

adviseScripts.text: I don't snore when I sleep, do I?
adviseScripts.speaker: Neve

adviseScripts.text: Louder than anyone I've ever heard.
I've never heard you snore.
... Really?
adviseScripts.speaker: Neve

adviseScripts.text: I thought I didn't...
adviseScripts.speaker: Neve

adviseScripts.text: Phew, that's a relief.
adviseScripts.speaker: Neve

adviseScripts.text: I was worried that
adviseScripts.speaker: Neve

adviseScripts.text: what if you had heard me snore.
adviseScripts.speaker: Neve

adviseScripts.text: I have a meaningful conversation with Neve.
How are you not tired right now?
adviseScripts.speaker: Neve

adviseScripts.text: I'm even sleepier than usual...
adviseScripts.speaker: Neve

adviseScripts.text: Then get some sleep.
Can't you fight the urge to sleep?
If you say so.
adviseScripts.speaker: Neve

adviseScripts.text: You know me, I never turn down a chance to sleep.
adviseScripts.speaker: Neve

adviseScripts.text: Make sure to wake me up later.
adviseScripts.speaker: Neve

adviseScripts.text: I tried, but it doesn't work.
adviseScripts.speaker: Neve

adviseScripts.text: Actually... I feel like I... I'm gonna fall asleep now...
adviseScripts.speaker: Neve

adviseScripts.text: Zzzz...
adviseScripts.speaker: Neve

adviseScripts.text: I keep quiet so as not to wake up Neve.
People say that polar bears are fond of that dark brown carbonated drink.
adviseScripts.speaker: Neve

adviseScripts.text: What about you, Burly Bear? Which soft drink do you prefer?
adviseScripts.speaker: Neve

adviseScripts.text: Green carbonated drink.
Brown carbonated drink.
The only thing about that is,
adviseScripts.speaker: Neve

adviseScripts.text: it doesn't give you so much sweetness that brown drink does.
adviseScripts.speaker: Neve

adviseScripts.text: You can't go wrong with that!
adviseScripts.speaker: Neve

adviseScripts.text: I prefer brown carbonated drink as well.
adviseScripts.speaker: Neve

adviseScripts.text: I have a conversation about drinks we like with Neve.
Whenever you're asleep,
adviseScripts.speaker: Neve

adviseScripts.text: what do you dream about?
adviseScripts.speaker: Neve

adviseScripts.text: Of being around you.
I don't dream.
No kidding!
adviseScripts.speaker: Neve

adviseScripts.text: Sometimes, I dream of being with you too.
adviseScripts.speaker: Neve

adviseScripts.text: Although usually, I'm dreaming about frolicking with polar bears.
adviseScripts.speaker: Neve

adviseScripts.text: You don't?
adviseScripts.speaker: Neve

adviseScripts.text: Sleeping must be super relaxing for you then.
adviseScripts.speaker: Neve

adviseScripts.text: I have a conversation about dreams with Neve.
Even though polar bears are what I'm after,
adviseScripts.speaker: Neve

adviseScripts.text: I've run into all sorts of wildlife in my search.
adviseScripts.speaker: Neve

adviseScripts.text: Are there any other animals you want to see besides polar bears?
adviseScripts.speaker: Neve

adviseScripts.text: An arctic hare.
A killer whale.
An arctic hare, huh?
adviseScripts.speaker: Neve

adviseScripts.text: I bet they'd be super cute, just like a polar bear.
adviseScripts.speaker: Neve

adviseScripts.text: Let's try and find one on our next search!
adviseScripts.speaker: Neve

adviseScripts.text: A killer whale?
adviseScripts.speaker: Neve

adviseScripts.text: They seem a little scary to me.
adviseScripts.speaker: Neve

adviseScripts.text: Neve and I talk about which animals we'd most like to see.
